column1: Report title: Homicide Trends in United States
Authors: Erica Smith and Alexia Cooper
Figure 26. Homicides of intimates, by sex of victim, 1980-2008
Note: Percentages are based on the 63.1% of homicides between 1980 and 2008 for which the victim/offender relationships were known.
Intimate includes spouses, ex-spouses, boyfriends, girlfriends, and same-sex relationships. Friend/acquaintance includes neighbor, employee, employer, and other known persons.
